short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the download bar at the bottom of Chrome windows (does nothing else).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the download bar from view, for use with Gryphen POSCore EPoS Software primarily but can be used  for any other purpose. All this extension does is disable the downloads bar.
